channel.title: Cliffy B: Don't Call My Comeback a Comeback
channel.description:
The former Epic Games designer says we'll learn more about his future plans over the coming week:
"I'm officially coming out of retirement to make video games again. Stay tuned for details in the next 7 days!"
[url='https://twitter.com/therealcliffyb/status/483650607211765761']https://twitter.com/therealcliffyb/status/483650607211765761[/url]
